Due to the many different departments and Hierarchal structures of each department, this may cause friction and departmental disputes
Training and implementation of the Scrum mindset and functions together with Agile methodology will need to be taught and explained to each department
Clear leadership and hierarchal Roles need to be assigned and introduced to the different departments that have roles to play 
Team Collaboration 

Impediment removal and conflict resolution 
Coaching and mentoring – developing the team, product owner and the oginization
Facilitation by the scrum master to qguide scrum events to be more productive and outcome oriented
Cross Functunality in the IT departments
Estimations – creating realistic timeframes and deadlines
